ingredients: 1 stem fresh lemongrass, trimmed and thinly sliced
2 in piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped
1 (15-oz) can coconut milk (do not shake can)
1/2–1 tbsp Thai fish sauce or salt to taste
Deep-fried basil leaves and thinly sliced red chile, to garnish
Deep-fried basil leaves and thinly sliced red chile, to garnish
